review: Works alright. Loses connection often and you need to restart your casting app to correct it. Sometimes it doesn't connect at all. Signal strength is high so I don't know what the problem might be.
author: Jimmy

review: Can't say enough how much we are enjoying Google Chromecast...it works like a charm...brings so many programs, movies and series to our living room...we use it every day and love, love love it. So glad I bought it.
author: Granny Jan

review: Works ok when it does. Most of the time I'm playing with to work. I'm in the video industry
author: Dennis

review: With Hulu and Netflix, this was the inexpensive way to cut the cable bill in our house.  Has been very reliable and fast for us.
author: Casey Guccione

review: It was a gift. They did not want it
author: Gerry

review: I recieved some piss poor chinese replica... THIS IS NOT A CHROMECAST. Took about 3 weeks to recieve and to my display the brand is "wescast". Thoroughly disappointed. Better off buying in store, what you physically see is what you get, instead of this BS. USERS PLEASE READ AND RE CONSIDER THIS PURCHASE. SPEND THE EXTRA $10 AND BUY THIS IN STORE. I am returning this pos and buying a kindle fire sitck IN STORE
author: George T. Rivers
